questionText.text:
Given below are few scenarios, for capturing specialized data through wireshark tool.
1. Scenario 1: capture all data.
2. Scenario 2: use filters to capture all data on port 3128.
3. Scenario 3: use filters to capture data originated/destined to known IP address (like google IP, your friends IP, LMS, proxy server IP)

Note:Capture inherent /ongoing network events. Alternatively use network commands if you can't raise such traffic.This activity is for academic purpose only to understand underlying protocols & tool. This is not an encouragement for invading fellow LAN users privacy.
Submit google docs link.This assignment will be graded out of a total of 10 marks
